channel.title: GTA IV expansion
channel.description: Is it worth the $20? I heard it was, but i also heard it sucked.I dont want to blow my money on something lame, so if you have it post your opinion k thanks.

item.title: GTA IV expansion
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

sanga282:

Have microsoft payed for exclusivity forever? or just a delay on the release of a PC version at least. I doubt they will release it for PS3 because Microsoft probably payed for it not to be. But I woulda thought that at least it would’ve have been released for PC a bit later on

Microsoft apparently “Loaned” (One of their PR games named it that) the $50m to rockstar and the repayments was in the two pieces of episodic DLC.

If they do ever bring the DLC out for PC, it won’t be for at least another few years and at a discounted rate because the whole point of getting this exclusive DLC was for people to buy the 360 for it.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA IV expansion
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yeah, it was all because microsoft wanted people to buy it for the 360 instead, because of course it earns them more money. And if they didn’t have a 360, buy one.

Though, i guess this was a kick in the balls after microsoft put up $50m for two pieces of exclusive episodic content because of:

"Edward Williams - BMO Capital Markets

First of all, going back to JT’s line of questioning, can you give us an idea as to this 13 million GTA 4 units, how many of those are Xbox 360 platform? So what’s the addressable market for the downloadable The Lost and Damned.

Lainie Goldstein

It’s approximately 50/50, Ed."

And i’m pretty sure they ignored the PC through that discussion for a reason. So it seems despite:
PS3’s higher price, lower install base and no exclusive DLC - it still managed to near enough keep up with the 360 version.

Anyway, rockstar said they might be doing DLC for other platforms after they have completed this contract (only one more piece of episodic content to go).

Read full topic

item.title: GTA IV expansion
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

nohope:

PS3 FANBOYS LOL

What about PC? It’s only for the 360…

Oh well, who cares, GTA4 wasn’t that good.

[quote=“sanga282, post:7, topic:266523”][quote author=Davidude link=topic=351991.msg2701441#msg2701441 date=1236633210]

What’s new in it?

New storyline which is like 24 missions long. (AFAIK from reading gtaforums.com).

It’s xbox only so it can go get fucked.
[/quote]
Not even PC? thats stupid[/quote]

Blame Microsoft.
